sn24.45:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.45:1.3: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti?
sn24.45:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati—
sn24.45:2.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.45:3.4: viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.45:3.8: Tasmim sati, tadupadaya, evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.45:3.9: ‘na vata vayanti, na najjo sandanti, na gabbhiniyo vijayanti, na candimasuriya udenti va apenti va esikatthayitthita’”ti.

sn24.45:3.19: Tasmim sati, tadupadaya evam ditthi uppajjati:
